svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Beef and buffalo meat consumption per person
Average per capita consumption of bovine meat (beef and buffalo), measured in kilograms per person per year. Data
is based on per capita food supply at the consumer level, but does not account for food waste at the consumer level.
Source: UN Food and Agricultural Organization (FAO)
